bibl.title: The True History of the So-Called Artemidorus Papyrus. A Supplement.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Luciano CANFORA, The True History of the So-Called Artemidorus Papyrus, with an interim text. Translations by Paul JARVIS, Ruth Anne HENDERSON and Margherita LOSACCO = Ἔκδοσις. 5 (Bari, 2007).
CANFORA Luciano (Ed.), The True History of the So-Called Artemidorus Papyrus. A Supplement.
Bari, Edizioni di Pagina, 2008, 8°, 48 pp. ISBN 978-88-7470-074-5.
